episodes.title: Ricardo Garate - "Exposing WMSCOG Cult Tactics"
episodes.description:
Our interviews are based solely on ones own experiences, recollections and opinions. We understand that what may be discussed does not reflect everyone's experiences, but that doesn't mean the experiences discussed on this channel are invalid simply because you didn't share the same experience. Our mission is to tell both sides of each story and let you the viewer make your own educated decision on what you want to believe in and follow. Every story deserves to be told and shared.

Today we dive into the tactics of the WMSCOG, what makes members stay in the organization and what fears they have when they leave. Our guest is Ricardo Garate who was a member for 7 years in the Santee - California church. In this video Ricardo discusses doctrinal issues with the WMSCOG, cult tactics and issues members of this organization have to face.

To see Ricardo's full story on GLS - Click Here - https://youtu.be/o46dkWguHmY?si=qZ9JPQmMsJF0xkuC

To read “The New Jerusalem and the Bride: Interpretation on the Women’s Veil” - Click Here - https://ncpcog.site/truth-books/ 

Towards the end of the video we also discuss different strategies of what might help members leave the organization and advice to friends and family who may have loved ones inside the church. Of course no strategy or advice is 100% guaranteed to work, but at least it can give you a place to start.

**DISCLAIMER** In the video we talk about some dangerous cults that have popped up in history and discuss what crimes they committed, what happened to their members and the tactics behind these groups. Some of these include self harm, murder and sexual assault. Some material may not be suitable for all viewers, viewer discretion is advised.

**DISCLAIMER**
The views and opinions expressed on this channel are solely those of the narrator and or guests. episodes.title: Is God the Mother REAL or HERETICAL? You Decide!
episodes.description:
In this video we do a deep dive into the teaching regarding God the Mother as well as discussing the possible origins of where this teaching came from. We also analyze the claims of the WMSCOG and see if they match up to scripture and evidence. At the end of the day it is up to you to decide what to believe and follow, however how can you decide without a thorough examination?

**Grab Your Bibles** It will be easier to follow along. Also please check out the Works Cited portion of the description and enjoy the rabbit hole.

**Also some people may deem the content explicit as we will discuss doctrine of spiritual procreation. Viewer discretion is advised.**

**Time Stamp**

0:00 Introduction
1:22 God the Mother Teaching Break Down
18:45 Origin of God the Mother Teaching
22:12 About "Elohim"
25:08 Examining "us" and "our", where did female image come from?
33:33 What does it imply "Mother gives life spiritually just like our physical mothers?"
37:07 Does John 6 "raise up on last day" mean God the Mother?
39:08 How Ahnsahnghong taught life is given by God
41:08 Is Ezekiel 47 about "Mother" or someone else?
46:00 Is Zechariah 14 "WOL flowing from Jerusalem" about Mother?
54:01 Is the Bride in Rev 22:17 the giver of WOL?
1:02:30 What about the Heavenly Wedding Banquet?
1:05:30 Is Rev 19:7 referring to God the Mother?
1:10:20 About Adam and Eve being "One" and "Mother of all the living"
1:21:21 About the "Most Holy Place"
1:26:28 What did Ahnsahnghong write concerning "God the Mother"
1:43:06 Questions for the WMSCOG leaders.

episodes.title: Han's Story "Breaking Free From Religious Control" - WMSCOG Ex Member
episodes.description:
Our interviews are based solely on ones own experiences, recollections and opinions. We understand that what may be discussed does not reflect everyone's experiences, but that doesn't mean the experiences discussed on this channel are invalid simply because you didn't share the same experience. Our mission is to tell both sides of each story and let you the viewer make your own educated decision on what you want to believe in and follow. Every story deserves to be told and shared.

Today we take a look at the story of Han Schardinger who was born and raised in Korea until coming to the U.S. when he was 8 years old. He was born in the church and remained a faithful member until he was in his early 20's. He talks of meeting Mother and the time he remembers being in the WMSCOG in Korea. His estranged Father is a Missionary currently serving somewhere on the East Coast near New Windsor, New York. We also get insight of why he decided to leave the WMSCOG and what advice he has to give for others in the church.

Towards the end of the video we also discuss different strategies of what might help members leave the organization and advice to friends and family who may have loved ones inside the church. Of course no strategy or advice is 100% guaranteed to work, but at least it can give you a place to start.

episodes.title: Sabbath = Salvation? Sunday = Condemnation? Ex WMSCOG Member Analysis
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will easier to follow along. 

My goal for this video is for you to know everything about the Sabbath day. What you do with the information presented in this video is completely up to you. I hope this provides you insight and opens up your mind to realize the true will of the God in accordance with the context of the bible.

The WMSCOG says if you don't keep Sabbath at their specific churches you are going to go to hell. They also say that they teach everything in accordance with the bible. In this video we simply analyze those claims and see how accurate they are.

episodes.title: Biblical Salvation vs WMSCOG's Salvation Which One Will SAVE You? Part 1. Finding the Alternative.
episodes.description:
This is a repost of the saved by faith video posted a couple weeks ago, for some reason the other video had terrible audio.

**Grab Your Bibles** It will be a lot easier to follow along if you have them open and ready.

In this video we dive into how as Christians we obtain salvation and how we are justified before God. The WMSCOG says we need to keep all of their feasts, regulations and basically whatever they deem necessary.

But is that how the bible describes salvation being given? If so then amen, we should do as the WMSCOG say. But if the bible doesn't say that, are you willing to let go of the WMSCOG and follow the bible. Are you willing to free yourself from their grasp and follow the bible? Only you can decide that for yourself.

I am going to make this very simple. You are saved by faith. It is through faith that you are justified, it is through faith that you are able to do good works, it is through faith that you are made righteous in God's sight.

episodes.title: Sunset or Sunrise? When does the Day BEGIN? Examining WMSCOG Day Reckoning and Feasts.
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will be a lot easier to follow along.

Today we will examine whether the bible teaches that the day begins at sunrise or sunset. The reason for this subject is that the WMSCOG is adamant that the day begins at sunrise. This another way the WMSCOG separates themselves from all other Churches. They teach that unless you realize when the day begins, you will not be able to keep the Feasts. If you cant keep the Feasts, you are not doing the will of God. In short, you are going to be sent to hell.

To normal Christians this subject will seem pointless or meaningless but to our friends in the WMSCOG this is a matter of Heaven or Hell.

**Time Stamp**
0:00 Intro
1:09 WMSCOG Breakdown
3:46 Genesis 1:1-5 (Creation) Biblical Analysis
7:50 Different types of "Evenings" in Hebrew
10:24 Exodus 12 & Leviticus 23, When does U-Bread begin? Biblical Analysis
15:04 When does the Day of Atonement begin? Biblical Analysis
17:51 The regulation of water of cleansing in Numbers 19, proves Sunset Reckoning
19:23 Sunset Reckoning proven through the burial of Jesus
23:19 Jesus Resurrection proves Sunset Reckoning
26:20 Answering the WMSCOG countermeasure against Sunset Reckoning
29:06 About Ascension Day
33:01 About Unleavened Bread and First Fruits

**Works Cited**

episodes.title: Passover vs. WMSCOG: The Surprising Differences You Need to Know Part 3
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles**  This is Part 3 of 3 - You Made It!!

**Summary of Content**
1. Clement of Alexandria wrote Paedagogus (The Tutor) published in 198 AD. In which gives commentary on John 6:53-54 "The flesh figuratively represents to us the Holy Spirit; for the flesh was created by Him. The blood points out to us the Word, for as rich blood the Word has been infused into life"
2. Eusebius of Caesarea wrote Ecclesiastical History between 312 and 324 CE. What is the really happening between Polycrates and Victor? Why is it important?
3. Polycarp received the office of Consecrating from Pope Victor after the first Easter controversy. 
4. Irenaeus (Polycarp's Disciple) kept the Eucharist on Resurrection Sunday. Polycrates has no problem with that, His issue was the Excommunication by Pope Victor.
5. Hippolytus (Irenaeus' Disciple) in Apostolic Traditions taught that the oblation (Eucharist) is done on Sunday. In his book (Refutation of all Heresies Book VIII) he taught that insisting on the Jewish way ( Quartodecimans) is heretical.
6. Constantine never abolished the Passover in 325 AD, he merely gathered bishops all over the world and told them to deal with Arianism firstly, and then resolve the dissention between churches in regards to Easter. The leaders of the Church voted to celebrate it on Resurrection Sunday.
7. The Jewish calendar has been changed multiple times and even has buffer months and leap years. The reason is to keep the Passover from coming to early before the lambs are ready.
8. Irenaeus said that we should not follow the Jewish view of the Eucharist (Fragments of Irenaeus)
9. What does the Didache (Teaching 70-150AD) say about the Eucharist?
10. "Breaking bread" is synonymous with Eucharist.
12. The 3 reasons why I show all this history. First Church history is a lot more messy than you think it is. Second, we should know all the church history, not just the history that fits WMSCOG. Third, the churches all did different things.
13. The bible doesn't condemn those who DO NOT keep the WMSCOG's version of New Covenant Passover.

**Works Cited**
file:///C:/Users/a041286.FBDOMAIN/Downloads/29251-john-or-paul-who-was-polycarp-s-mentor.pdf
https://www.google.com/books/edition/Ecclesiastical_History/xqU8AAAAYAAJ?hl=en&gbpv=1&bsq=Passover
https://www.christian-history.org/polycarps-philippian-epistle.html
https://www.newadvent.org/cathen/01637a.htm
https://www.stjohnsarlingtonva.org/Customer-Content/saintjohnsarlington/CMS/files/EFM/Apostolic_Tradition_by_Hippolytus.pdf
https://www.newadvent.org/fathers/02091.htm

episodes.title: Passover vs. WMSCOG: The Surprising Differences You Need to Know Part 2
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles**  This is Part 2 of 3

**Summary of Content**
1. Examining the website article from "trueWMSCOG" about Armstrong and the Radio Church of God
2. Armstrong actually fulfills the 7 Churches prophecy as well
3. Is restoration about the 1st month 14th day or is about the belief in God
4. Is the WMSCOG the first and only Church that teaches bread and wine is for forgiveness of sins and eternal life?
5. There were two calendars in ancient Judaism. Passover was kept by the Pharisee's on 1.13 and the Sadducees kept Passover on 1.14.
6. Matthew, Mark and Luke write from a Pharisaic point of view. John rights from a Sadducean point of view.
7. New Covenant (Jesus' Blood) sets us free from the food, drink and external regulations of the old covenant.
8. WMSCOG says we still need food, drink and external regulations.
9. Sacrifices done every year do not forgive sins.
10. Jesus blood forgives once and for all, He is not sacrificed year after year.
11. New Covenant Passover doesn't forgive sins once and for all, if it did you wouldn't need to keep it year after year.
12. Hebrew never mentions the bread and wine regulation at all when speaking of the New Covenant.
13. Where is the phrases "New Covenant Passover", "Feasts of the New Covenant" in the Bible?
14. Eucharist is in the bible, the Greek word for "thanksgiving" or "cup of thanksgiving" is eucharistia. That is why the early church refers to the bread and wine as eucharist, meaning eucharist is in the bible, New Covenant Passover is not.
15. Old Covenant Passover regulation involves bread and wine, so the premise of the New Covenant being bread and wine is invalid as that was required for the Old Covenant to be observed.
16. Jesus gave the wine twice during the last supper not just once.
17. Jesus got up FROM the meal to wash His disciples feet, meaning they had already started eating before the feet were washed. This contradicts WMSCOG teaching of you must wash the feet before the Passover to eat it.
18. John never mentions bread and wine in his gospel, ever. Which means that Jesus flesh and blood in John 6 must mean something else. John tells us Jesus words are spirit and they are life.

**Works Cited**
https://www.cs.cornell.edu/info/people/kreitz/Christian/Cults/5.armstrong.pdf
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Miller_(preacher)#CITEREFMiller1845
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Church_of_God_(Seventh_Day)
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Herbert_W._Armstrong
https://www.biblegateway.com/
https://www.google.com/books/edition/Chronological_Aspects_of_the_Life_of_Chr/fS28b9GC1dcC?hl=en&gbpv=1&pg=PA9&printsec=frontcover
https://www.thetruewmscog.com/ahnsahnghong-or-armstrong-who-restored-the-passover-first/
https://biblehub.com/text/matthew/26-27.htm
https://www.gotquestions.org/transubstantiation.html

episodes.title: Passover vs. WMSCOG: The Surprising Differences You Need to Know Part 1
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles**  This is Part 1 of 3

**Summary of Content**
1. Armstrong of the World Wide Church of God restored the Passover in 1934
2. Twilight in Exodus 12:6 and Leviticus 23:5 is actually 9th hour or 3pm not sunset.
3. Lasting ordinance implies that it lasts only until Jesus comes and establishes the New Covenant with His blood.
4. Generations to come is referring to Jews not the Gentiles.
5. The Old Covenant is full of regulations that say "lasting ordinance" or "for the generations to come" or "forever" but the WMSCOG doesn't insist on them.
6. Jesus died on Passover according to John, not only that but was crucified "between the evenings" "9th hour" or 3pm just as the Passover lambs were being slaughtered.
7. 1st month 15th day is a Sabbath according to Leviticus 23:5, meaning the Jews would not have crucified Jesus on Unleavened Bread as it would be desecrating the Feasts.
8. The chronology of Matthew, Mark, Luke and John's Gospel.
9. Examining the problems with the chronology of Matthew, Mark, Luke and John's Gospel.

episodes.title: The TRUTH About WMSCOG's Book Of Life - Biblical Analysis
episodes.description:
Curious about the WMSCOG's Book of Life? Watch this video to uncover the truth about Christ Ahnsahnghong, WMSCOG, and the controversial teachings of this religious group known as the "Book of Life".

 **Grab Your Bibles** it is much easier to follow along.

**Content Summary**
1. The Old Testament words "blotted our of Heaven" or "blotted out of the book of the living" has the meaning of God will destroy them.
2. God keeps records of everything we do, but not in physical books rather keeps records in heaven.
3. Are Abraham, Isaac, Jacob and all the prophets in the book of life? If so, then where is that physical book to confirm?
4. The meaning of "whatever you bind on earth has been bound in heaven" is understood as a Chaldean and rabbinical idiom to forbid, prohibit, declare to be illicit. 
5. The meaning  "whatever you loose on earth will be loosed in heaven" is understood as a Chaldean and Talmudic usage to declare lawful.
6.  It simply means that whatever was done in Heaven has already been done, the apostles are just carrying it out. Not that the Apostles can do whatever they want and it's done in heaven.
7. If the book of life is physical book? What happens if there is fire or a flood and that book is destroyed? What if your name is spell wrong? What if someone in charge doesn't like you and erases your name?
8. GP and Mother's names are written in the book of life allegedly in the NCPCOG which is lead by Ahnsahnghong's son Pastor Ahn Kwang Sup. What if Pastor Kwang blotted out GP and Mother's name from the original book of life? Does that mean they wont go to heaven?
9. In Rev 3:5 the book of life appears in the Church of Sardis (1798-1834 AD) according to the 7 Churches prophecy. Which is considered the age of reformers. Then did the reformers restore the physical book of life? Why does the bible say the book of life appears in the Church of Sardis then?
10. The physical "book of life" in MY OPINION is a control tactic. It is used to scare and manipulate people into doing the churches bidding.
11. God's salvation is between you and Him. Not some physical perishable book that can be used as blackmail. God's providence is much more infallible and righteous than that.

**Time Stamp**
0:00 Intro to video
0:46 WMSCOG Book of Life Doctrine Breakdown
5:05 "blotting out" "written in heaven" Old Testament Contextual Analysis
13:44 "blotting out" "written in heaven" New Testament Contextual Analysis
17:03 "bind on earth, bound in heaven, loose on earth, loosed in heaven" Contextual Analysis
19:50 Fallacies of having a physical book of life.
22:53 How to have your name written in the book of life in HEAVEN
24:13 Conclusion of the WMSCOG Book of Life doctrine
25:57 Pray with me, if not NO PROBLEM at all. God Bless.

**Works Cited**
NIV version https://www.bible.com/bible
https://biblehub.com/text/matthew/16-19.htm
https://biblehub.com/text/matthew/18-18.htm

episodes.title: Is Fig Tree Blossoming REALLY a Sign of Jesus Return?
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** it will be a lot easier to follow along.

**Summary of Contents**
1. Han Enoch "Han Jin-kyo" correctly predicted in 1947 the year of 1948 being the restoration of Israel in his book "Eternal Gospel"
2. Reverend Moon of the Unification Church also taught that 1948 was the restoration of Israel and was a sign of second coming.
3. Mark 11:12-14, 20-21 is about praying without doubt.
4. Luke 13:6-9 and Luke 21:20-21 is about the destruction of Jerusalem.
5. "until" the time of the gentiles is fulfilled implies the restoration of Israel. 
6. The fig tree blossoming has a different context than "until the time of the gentiles are fulfilled".
7. When you see the fig tree and all the trees start to blossoming you know that summer is near. This is a parable.
8. When you see all these things happening "wars, earthquakes, uprisings, false Christs, etc." you know He is near. This is the interpretation Jesus gave.
9. The fig tree blossoming is not 1948, but it is the fulfillment of "until".
10. IF the 1948 was the year. Jesus said that THIS generation will NOT pass away.
11. Most of the generation of 1948 has passed away.
12. Ahnsahnghong taught that the "generation" regarding the fig tree was 40 years. 1940 + 40 years = 1988, which should have been the end. It wasn't.

**Time Stamp**
0:00 Intro
1:00 Subject "Learn the lesson from the fig tree" breakdown.
4:08 The origin's of the doctrine
5:31 Mark chapter 11 biblical analysis
7:14 Luke chapter 13 biblical analysis
8:38 Luke chapter 21 biblical analysis
10:03 "fulfillment of all that has been written" biblical analysis
13:13 "until the times of the gentiles are fulfilled" biblical analysis
16:15 the correct meaning of "fig tree blossoming"
21:30 "this generation WILL NOT pass away"
23:45 the conclusion of the WMSCOG teaching regarding fig tree.

**Works Cited**

episodes.title: Does Jesus really come again in FLESH? WMSCOG Teaching Analysis
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will be so much easier to follow along. I promise.

**Summary of Important Points**
1. Reverend Moon taught that Daniel 7:13 was about first coming and that clouds mean flesh in his book "Divine Principle" 1951.
2. Does Jesus come "like a cloud" or "on the clouds"? Big Difference. Therefore Proverbs 25 and Jude verse 12 are not relevant. 
3. Mt 24:20-31, How can the people of the earth all mourn when they see the second coming IF it is a SECRET coming that no one knows.
4. 1 Th 4:16 talks of the trumpet being sounded on Judgement day. Jesus says trumpets will sound at His second coming Mt 24:31.
5. People and the world is a time of great distress unequaled from the beginning never to be equaled again both on Judgement Day and Second Coming. Mt 24:21, 29, Lk 21:26 & 1 Th 5:1-3
6. Jesus can come to Judge and Save at the same time at Second Coming. Just like how WMSCOG teaches Ahnsahnghong comes to Judge and to Save at the same time.
7. In Ex 13:21 God appeared as a pillar of fire and cloud on the same day.
8. Lk 21:18 "These things" means more than one event. When "these things begin to take place" verse 8-28, that is when your redemption is NEAR. Your redemption is HERE when second coming Christ comes.
9. Sign in the sun, moon and starts happens before the dreadful day of the lord and second coming, Mt 24:29-30, Is 13:19-13, 34:1-4 & Joel 2:28-31.
10. Daniel 7:13 is about second coming Jesus. The son of man comes on the clouds AFTER the little horn (anti-Christ).
11. Rev 13, 17&18 The beast, Babylon appear. Rev 19 the rider on the white horse appears to wage war. This mirrors Daniel 7.
12. Not all nations or people of every language worshiped Jesus His first coming. He was only sent to the lost sheep of Israel, Mt 15:24. Only after Pentecost did the gospel get preached to Gentiles, Acts 10:27-37.
13. Acts 1:9-11 Jesus went up into Heaven with His resurrected body. That same Jesus will come back in the same way, with His resurrected body.
14. Mt 24:20-21 imply that the Sabbath should be kept even on the Last Day. Then Mt 24:22-26 "don't believe people who say "here He is" must also apply to us on the last days too. 
15. "Green Book" chapter 15 page 109 and chapter 11 page 74 contradict. Ahnsahnghong says Isa 66:15-16 is about God coming in the flesh that we can see, then later says it is about God coming with fire that we can't see. Which one is it?
16. "Green Book" chapter 16 page 11. Ahnsahnghong said the gospel will be preached to the WHOLE world in 37 years. This did not happen.
17. 1948 + 37= 1985 (X), 1964 + 37= 2001 (X) and 1985 + 37= 2022 (X).
18. Second coming has not happened yet, when it does you will not miss it.

**Works Cited**
https://biblehub.com/greek/nephelo_n_3507.htm
https://www.biblegateway.com/
https://ncpcog.church/foriginalbooks/
https://m.blog.naver.com/PostView.naver?blogId=godhoom1&logNo=220018323695&navType=by (1999 Publication)

**Time Stamp**
0:00 Intro
0:59 Subject Begins
1:09 2nd Coming and Judgement Breakdown
3:19 "Divine Principle" written by Moon about coming on the clouds.
4:17 The verses about "clouds". Biblical Analysis
7:05 Does Jesus come "like a cloud" OR "on the clouds"?
8:38 If Christ comes in secret, why do all people on the earth mourn?
10:42 "coming with fire" or "day of the Lord". Biblical Analysis
14:33 Striking similarities between Judgement Day and Second Coming.
16:22 Are the purposes of Second Coming and Judgement Different?
16:55 "pillar of cloud" and "pillar of fire"
17:29 Timing of Second Coming and Judgement
18:44 Sign in the Sun, Moon and Stars. Biblical Analysis
24:44 Daniel 7:13 "coming on the clouds". Biblical Analysis
34:21 Acts 1:9-11 "why are you looking up"? Biblical Analysis
38:28 Jesus does come in the flesh His second coming.
39:43 Does the Sabbath apply to the Last Days? Then so does Jesus' warning about False Christs.
43:46 Contradictions in the "Mystery of God and the Spring of the Water of Life"
47:17 Conclusion
47:48 A personal message to my WMSCOG friends.

episodes.title: WMSCOG's King David Prophecy Debunked The Shocking Truth Revealed
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will be much easier to follow along

Brief Summary of Contents:
1. The book title "God in the flesh" published in 1977 contains the same teaching about King David as the WMSCOG
2. "Mystery of God and the Spring of the Water of Life" chapter 21 (original) or chapter 19 (altered version) written in 1980 by Christ Ahnsahnghong mirrors the book "God in the flesh".
3. The Apostles considered their timeframe the "last days". Acts 2:14-17, Hebrews 1:2 and 1 John 2:18.
4. Hosea 3:5 is fulfilled by Jesus at His first coming.
5. Jesus reigns and upholds the throne FOREVER. Not 3 years or 37 years. Isaiah 9:6-7, Luke 1:31-33
6. Jesus began His ministry at the age of 30, most likely because it was customary at the time for Rabbi's or teachers to begin public ministry at 30.
7. If Jesus appears in secret (Hebrews 9:28) then who are those "waiting for him"? How can you wait for someone you don't know you should be expecting or if you don't know they exist?
8. Christ only dies ONCE. Romans 6:8-10 & Hebrews 9:25-28
10. The Covenant God made with David is the THRONE and LINEAGE of David. Psalm 89:3-4, 24-29 & 35-37
11. There is NO proof in the Bible that King David kept the Passover.
12. The Everlasting Covenant made in Isaiah 55 is made with Israel not David. 
13. The sign of the Everlasting Covenant (Isa 55:3) is "is instead of thornbush you will have juniper and instead of briers you will have myrtle". What does that have to do with Passover?
14. The Everlasting Covenant is the blood of Jesus, not bread and wine.
15. The bread and wine is a REPRESENTATION of Jesus sacrifice.
16. If the ETERNAL Covenant is the Passover that the WMSCOG teaches. Then why was it ABOLISHED? 
17. Jesus baptism that He had to undergo is referring to His suffering on the cross. Not a secret water baptism in 1948.
19. Baptism can be symbolic and is not always literal. Romans 6:2-4 & Acts 1:5
20. Christ Ahnsahnghong consider his 37 ministry started 1951 not 1948.
21. He taught that he would ascend alive with the 144,000 in 1988.
22. He consider himself Elijah that was preparing the way for Second Coming Jesus.
23. Jesus said "it is finished". Meaning He had accomplished everything He originally came to earth to accomplish.

**Time Stamp**
0:00 Intro
0:45 Teaching Break Down
4:08 Origin
5:54 the "last days"
6:50 The length of Jesus Reign
13:22 How long is Jesus ministry?
15:20 Isaiah 55 verse 3 biblical analysis
18:03 NO biblical evidence that King David kept the Passover
19:05 The Covenant God made with David
20:44 what is the Everlasting Covenant?
23:44 the baptism Jesus said He still had to undergo
28:40 The ARTICLE published in 1981

**Works Cited**

https://ncpcog.church/foriginalbooks/

episodes.title: Is Ahnsahnghong the NEW NAME? Examining the WMSCOG
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will make it easier to follow.

Summarization of Content:
1. The Teaching of Regarding 3 ages and the name of the savior in each age. (Age of the Father, Son and Holy Spirit)
2. Ahnsahnghong taught that we are saved in the name Jesus both in the age of the son and in the last days.
3. The name Jehovah is Latin for "YHWH" appearing first in the Dark Ages.
4. God has many names in the Old Testament.
5. "Jesus" is Latin from the Greek "lesous" which is comes from the Hebrew "Yeshuah or Yehoshuah" which is all throughout the Old Testament.
6. "Jesus" also did not appear until around the 16th century.
7. Wouldn't it make sense to be baptized in the original Hebrew names of God the Father and the Son, just like we have to use Ahnsahnghong?
8. Matthew 28:19 "name" or Greek "onoma" means authority of.
9. The New Name (Rev 2:17) is given AFTER overcoming, not before.
10. The New Name (Rev 2:17) is given to someone that only THEY will know. So it is NOT a name that many will know, like Ahnsahnghong.
11. The New Name should appear in the Church of Pergamum (313-538ad) according to the 7 Churches Prophecy.
12. We too are regarded as living stones 1 Peter 2:5
13. God has given "new names" to many of His people. Abram - Abraham, Jacob - Israel, Simon - Peter and Saul to Paul.
14.  The New Name (Father), New Jerusalem (Mother) (Rev 3:12) should appear in the Church in Philadelphia (1798-1844).
15. If names are important than why do you not pray in Mother's name, but instead you pray to her TITLE?
16. "Vicarius Filii Dei" is described as a name (Rev 13), but WMSCOG uses it as the title of the Pope. 
17. WMSCOG uses the names "Jehovah" and "Jesus" in baptism which are from Latin, the same language that gives you 666 aka Mark of the Beast.
18. We are being built into a spiritual dwelling, as in currently. In Revelation 3 it describes that we are permanent fixtures that will never leave.
19. Revelation 19 describes Jesus has having multiple names: Faithful, True, Word of God, King of Kinds and Lord of Lords.
20. The New Name in Revelation 2 and Christ's New Name in Revelation 3 are spiritual gifts given to God's people for overcoming.

episodes.title: Is Ahnsahnghong the Root of David? A Biblical Analysis
episodes.description:
**Grab Your Bibles** It will be a lot easier to follow along.

In this video, we delve into a biblical analysis to determine if Ahnsahnghong is truly the Root of David. Join us as we explore the teachings of the World Mission Society Church of God and hear testimonies from a former member.

Brief Summary of Contents:

1. Rev Sun Myung Moon wrote about the lost truth being restored in 1951 "Divine Principle".
2. The sealed scroll, the Root of David and the Lamb are in Heaven, not on earth.
3. 6 of the seals are opened "Great Tribulation" happens before the Angel from the East arrives.
4. 6 seals are the "Great Tribulation" that the "great multitude" come out of.
5. The "great multitude" have washed their robes in the blood of the Lamb, aka kept the Passover.
6. How could the "great multitude" have kept Passover if they died before the Passover is restored.
7. Only the 144,000 are sealed, since the "great multitude" are deceased before Seal of God comes.
8. If Ahnsahnghong is the Root of David and he fulfilled prophecy. Then why are there 3 chapters missing from his books? Why are there so many additions and changes to the books we do have? Why can't we read all of his books for ourselves?
9. It appears to me that even the WMSCOG doesn't believe their own prophecy of Ahnsahnghong being the Root of David, otherwise they should allow all his material to be read by the members since the pages contain his burning tears for us.

Since the beginning of reformation groups there has always been a certain figure or chosen one at the forefront. This person is considered the only one who can restore the lost truth and everyone else stands condemned if they don't follow the movement. Here are a few examples.

SDA's has Ellen White, JW's has Charles Taze Russell, LDS has Joseph Smith Jr, Unification Church has Sun Myung Moon, Shincheonji has Lee Man Hee, Scientology has L Ron Hubbard, Olive Tree has Park Tae Sun, WMSCOG and NCPCOG has Ahnsahnghong and the list goes on and on.

Today we are examining the WMSCOG's claim that Ahnsahnghong fulfilled the prophecy of the Root of David who opens the scroll sealed with seven seals in Revelation chapter 5. 

They teach that the fulfillment is Ahnsahnghong who is God who comes in the flesh from the east and he is the only one who is able to understand the bible, reveal its secrets and restored the lost truth of the early church. All who reject his teaching are condemned for eternity.

If this prophecy is indeed fulfilled as the WMSCOG claims, then it means we should acknowledge it as such. But if it is not, then we need to acknowledge that too, instead of just insisting on our own thoughts or doctrine.

**REMINDER** if you are new to the channel, please watch the intro video first, it explains a lot, then come back to this video.

Time Stamp:
0:00 Beginning
0:14 Introduction
0:51 The Breakdown of the WMSCOG teaching of Root of David
2:45 "Divine Principle" written in 1951 by Sun Myung Moon
5:31 "Mystery of God and the Spring of the Water of Life" written in 1980 by Ahnsahnghong.
7:42 Revelation Chapter 5 verses 1 to 14 analysis
10:36 Isaiah Chapter 29 verses 1 to 12 analysis
13:57 Revelation Chapter 6 verses 1 to 17 analysis
19:24 Revelation Chapter 7 verses 1 to 14 analysis
23:01 Conclusion

episodes.title: I Spent 9 1/2 Years in WMSCOG and Here's What I Learned
episodes.description:
My name is Adam and I got involved with the WMSCOG at 19. I was in for nearly a decade and was in both a main church and house church until I left in 2024.

I started this channel to examine if the doctrines they teach hold up to what the bible says and if they are indeed factual or even original. If at the end of all this you still want to continue in the WMSCOG, then that is your God given right. You also have the right to know all the information, not just what THEY want you to know. Especially if you will devote your life to THEM.

My goal is NOT to hurt anyone or make someone doubt their faith. Some may call this slander or misinformation but I would argue that the real slander or misinformation is from the organizations themselves that have stolen minds, lives, money and souls. 

Lastly, my goal is to do my best to give you all the information so that you can decide for YOURSELF what is right for YOU. May God bless you and lead you into truth, and that the truth may set you free.

In this video, I share my personal experience of why I left WMSCOG after almost a decade. If you're a former member or curious about this church, this message is for you. Hear my story and perspective on the World Mission Society Church of God.

Time Stamp:
0:00 Beginning
0:25 Intro
0:40 Interesting Comments You NEED To SEE
3:48 Lawsuits Regarding WMSCOG
4:13 The 5 Groups Of People Who Will Watch This Video
6:42 Let The Rambling Begin
8:12 Did This Happen To You?
10:07 A Challenge For The WMSCOG
10:42 Message To Those On The Fence About Leaving WMSCOG
11:50 Who Would You Follow, Honestly?
13:04 Many Groups Consider Internet The TOK
 13:31 Are Ahnsahnghong's Original Books Available Online the TOK?
15:27 What To Expect From The Channel
